thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 17 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: India's BSE index breaches 35,000 level for first time as banks rally

author: Reuters Editorial
title: India's BSE index breaches 35,000 level for first time as banks rally
text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Indiaâ€™s benchmark BSE index breached the 35,000 mark for the first time on Wednesday, as banks rallied after the government decided to cut its additional market borrowing requirement by 60 percent for the current fiscal year.
The BSE index was up 0.89 percent at 35,081.82, while the broader NSE index ended 0.82 percent higher at 10,788.55. Both indexes posted record closing highs.
For the mid-day report, click. (Reporting by Jessica Kuruthukulangara in Bengaluru; Editing by Subhranshu Sahu)
